name: Star Wars: Fantasy Flight Games - Dice Roller
description: This is the Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Role Playing Game Dice Roller. It is used in combination with the Star Wars FFG API-Compatible Character Sheet.
authors: Konrad J.,Steve Day, Arron, Andrew H., Tom F., Akashan, GM Knowledge Rhino

useroptions.name: Log
useroptions.description: Sets the visual output in the chat window for the dice rolls.  Command: !eed log on|off|multi|single

useroptions.name: Graphics
useroptions.description: Description: Sets chat window dice output as graphic, small, medium, or large. Command: !eed graphics on|off|s|m|l

useroptions.name: Test
useroptions.description: Description: Output every side of every die to the chat window. * Command !eed test

useroptions.name: Debug
useroptions.description: Sets the logging level of the script in the API console.  If you are having issues with the script rolling incorect dice, turn on debug logging and post the result in the forums. No need to restart the script with this command. Command: !eed debug on|off

useroptions.name: Roll
useroptions.description: Set the skill name of the roll. Command: !eed label(Name of Skill)

useroptions.name: Initiative
useroptions.description: Set NPC/PC initiative true. Command: !eed npcinit or pcinit and #b #g #y #blk #p #r #w

useroptions.name: Skill
useroptions.description: Create the ability and proficiency dice for a skill check. Command: !eed skill(char_value|skill_value)

useroptions.name: Opposed
useroptions.description: Create the difficulty and challenge dice for an opposed skill check. Command: !eed opposed(char_value|skill_value)

useroptions.name: Dice
useroptions.description: Loop thru the dice and adds or subtracts them from the dice object. Command: !eed #g #y #b #blk #r #p #w #s #a

useroptions.name: Upgrade
useroptions.description: Upgrades ability and difficulty dice. Command: !eed upgrade(ability|#) or upgrade(difficulty|#)

useroptions.name: Downgrade
useroptions.description: Downgrades proficiency and challenge dice. Command: !eed downgrade(proficiency|#) or downgrade(challenge|#)

useroptions.name: Destiny
useroptions.description: Rolls 1w die and adds the result to the destiny pool. Command: !eed #w destiny doRoll

useroptions.name: Charsheet
useroptions.description: Generates a blank character sheet and automatically makes it viewable and editable by the person calling the script. Command: !charsheet
